Title: Gas Mileage for Windows Phone 7
Description: Gas Mileage for Windows Phone 7 lets you easily track your gas mileage on your phone.  Just enter a little bit of information every time you fill up your gas and Gas Mileage will take care of the number crunching.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Gas Mileage for Windows Phone 7 lets you easily track your gas mileage on your phone.

Download the Windows Phone 7 Development tools from http://developer.windowsphone.com.
